title: Bobby’s Dollar Bill Bet With Eddie + Amy Shares A Genius Parenting Tip + Battle Of The Bands: Little Big Town vs. Old Dominion
itunes:title: Bobby’s Dollar Bill Bet With Eddie + Amy Shares A Genius Parenting Tip + Battle Of The Bands: Little Big Town vs. Old Dominion
description:
Bobby challenges Eddie to a bet involving a dollar bill. They both stand on one side of a dollar bill and if Eddie can punch Bobby…he wins the bet! Amy shares a fun new parenting tip she is doing to encourage her kids to do chores around the house. Plus, we saw a recent Twitter feud going on between two classic rock bands…so we decided to put two country bands up against each other!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
